heading: Service on occupants
text:
Service may be made upon an occupant by delivering such notice to the occupant or to a
   person employed by the occupant to work at or to manage or maintain the premises at which the nuisance is located; or by
   affixing such notice to the premises at which the nuisance is located in a conspicuous place or by placing a copy under the
   entrance door of such premises and mailing a copy of such notice to the occupant at such premises; and in all instances except
   personal delivery upon such occupant, by mailing the notice of hearing to the occupant at the premises at which the nuisance is
   located.
